attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my 14 year old autistic son was savagley beaten my two boy of similar age the younger of the two was 11 the other boy was 14 years old my son 13 at the time children like this goes through a childrens panel because they are children we want the law changed so that this childrens panel is scrapped if the child is old enough to do the crime he is old enough to do the time it my be too late for my case but if i can stop kids getting assaulted by others ok kids do hit one another but one day they will kill a child this country protects the crimmanals not the victum time to take a stand protect kids from these thugs
